jProtocol.tls12.model.ciphersuites

Interface TlsCipherSuite

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TlsAeadCipherSuite, TlsBlockCipherSuite, TlsCipherSuite_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA, TlsCipherSuite_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TlsCipherSuite_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL, TlsCipherSuite_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA, TlsCipherSuite_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TlsStreamCipherSuite

    public interface TlsCipherSuite

    • Method Summary

      TlsBulkCipherAlgorithm getBulkCipherAlgorithm()

      The fixed initialization vector length used by AEAD ciphers for implicit nonce.

      The key exchange algorithm (dhe_dss, dhe_rsa, dh_anon, rsa, dh_dss, dh_rsa) used in the cipher suite.

      The MAC algorithm (null or hmac with md5, sha1, sha256, ...) used by the cipher suite.

      The MAC length of the cipher suite.

      The name equal to the cipher suite name in TLS 1.2 specification.

    • Method Detail

      • plaintextToCiphertext

        TlsCiphertext plaintextToCiphertext(TlsPlaintext plaintext,
                                    TlsEncryptionParameters parameters)
        Transforms a TLSPlaintext to a TLSCiphertext. The Message will be MACed and encrypted according to the used ciphersuite.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - the TLSPlaintext
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to encrypt
        Returns:
        the TLSCiphertext

      • ciphertextToPlaintext

        TlsPlaintext ciphertextToPlaintext(byte[] ciphertextBytes,
                                   TlsEncryptionParameters parameters,
                                   TlsCipherSuiteRegistry registry,
                                   TlsKeyExchangeAlgorithm algorithm)
                            throws TlsBadRecordMacException,
                                   TlsBadPaddingException,
                                   TlsDecodeErrorException
        Transforms a TLSCiphertext to a TLSPlaintext. The Message will be decrypted and the MAC will be checked according to the used ciphersuite.
        Parameters:
        ciphertextBytes - the TLSCiphertext bytes
        parameters - the encryption parameters used to decrypt
        registry - the cipher suite registry
        algorithm - the used key exchange algorithm
        Returns:
        the TlsPlaintext
        Throws:
        TlsBadRecordMacException - if the message has an invalid MAC
        TlsBadPaddingException - if decryption of the messages fails beacuse of invalid padding
        TlsDecodeErrorException - if the message itself can not be decoded properly

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name equal to the cipher suite name in TLS 1.2 specification.
        Returns:
        the cipher suite name

      • getCode

        short getCode()
        The two byte code used in handshake messages.
        Returns:
        the code

      • getCipherType

        TlsCipherType getCipherType()
        The cipher type (stream, block or aead) of the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the cipher type

      • getBulkCipherAlgorithm

        TlsBulkCipherAlgorithm getBulkCipherAlgorithm()
        The algorithm (null, rc4, 3des, aes) used for encryption.
        Returns:
        the encryption algorithm

      • getEncryptKeyLength

        byte getEncryptKeyLength()
        The length of the encryption key used by the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the encryption key length in bytes

      • getBlockLength

        byte getBlockLength()
        The block length of the encryption algorithm.
        Returns:
        the block length in bytes for block or AEAD cipher suites or 0 for stream cipher suites

      • getFixedIvLength

        byte getFixedIvLength()
        The fixed initialization vector length used by AEAD ciphers for implicit nonce.
        Returns:
        the length in bytes for AEAD ciphers or 0 for block and stream cipher suites

      • getRecordIvLength

        byte getRecordIvLength()
        The record initialization vector length used by block ciphers.
        Returns:
        the length in bytes for block ciphers or 0 for stream and AEAD cipher suites

      • getMacAlgorithm

        TlsMacAlgorithm getMacAlgorithm()
        The MAC algorithm (null or hmac with md5, sha1, sha256, ...) used by the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the MAC algorithm

      • getMacLength

        byte getMacLength()
        The MAC length of the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the length of the MAC in bytes or 0 for AEAD cipher suites

      • getMacKeyLength

        byte getMacKeyLength()
        The length of the MAC key needed by the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the MAC key length in bytes or 0 for AEAD cipher suites

      • getKeyExchangeAlgorithm

        TlsKeyExchangeAlgorithm getKeyExchangeAlgorithm()
        The key exchange algorithm (dhe_dss, dhe_rsa, dh_anon, rsa, dh_dss, dh_rsa) used in the cipher suite.
        Returns:
        the key exchange algorithm
